mapper.sql: withdraw_method_id, channel_id, name, valid_time_range, current_status, process_class, withdraw_method_id, withdraw_type_id, refer_uuid, weight, percent, commission, commission_type, refer_uuid, `data`, owner_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO withdraw_method (withdraw_method_id,owner_id, channel_id, name, valid_time_range, current_status, process_class, withdraw_type_id, refer_uuid, weight, percent, commission, commission_type, data) VALUES (#{withdrawMethodId},#{ownerId}, #{channelId}, #{name}, #{validTimeRange}, #{currentStatus}, #{processClass}, #{withdrawTypeId}, #{referUuid}, #{weight}, #{percent}, #{commission}, #{commissionType}, #{data, javaType=HashMap, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE withdraw_method SET channel_id = #{channelId}, name = #{name}, valid_time_range = #{validTimeRange}, current_status = #{currentStatus}, process_class = #{processClass}, withdraw_type_id = #{withdrawTypeId}, weight = #{weight}, percent = #{percent}, commission = #{commission}, commission_type = #{commissionType}, refer_uuid = #{referUuid}, data = #{data,javaType=HashMap, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id = #{ownerId}, `version` = #{version}
WHERE withdraw_method_id = #{withdrawMethodId} AND `version` < #{version}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM withdraw_method
ORDER BY channel_id ASC, weight DESC, withdraw_method_id ASC
